Text: Sumie Tanaka:  She was most well known for her long collaboration with film director Mikio Naruse and for writing screenplays for Japan's first major female director Kinuyo Tanaka.

Text: Sumie Tanaka: The screenplays she wrote for Repast ("めし", Meshi; 1951), Home Sweet Home ("我が家は楽し ", Wa ga ya wa tanoshi; 1951), and Record of Youth ("少年期 ", Shonenki; 1951) won her the Blue Ribbon Award for Best Screenplay in 1951.
